name: Moyer Aviation, Inc
about: Moyer Aviation, Inc., located at the Pocono Mountain Regional Airport in Tobyhanna, PA, is a renowned provider of aviation services with over 25 years of experience. Our flight school offers advanced FAA Part 141 training programs, affiliations with Liberty Universityâ€™s School of Aeronautics and Lehigh Carbon Community College, allowing students to pursue professional pilot degrees. We provide comprehensive training from private to ATP certificates, including instrument, commercial, and multiengine ratings. Our highly credentialed instructors use state-of-the-art Cessna aircraft and computerized training programs. Moyer Aviation also offers charter services, aircraft sales, maintenance, and rentals, ensuring a holistic aviation experience. With a strong focus on safety, customer satisfaction, and service excellence, Moyer Aviation is your gateway to a successful aviation career.
